He explained that marijuana helps him manage his mood, maintain calm, and feel more like himself, contrasting it with the negative effects of alcohol.

title: MLB trade rumors: Cubs tipped to land $400m Tigers Cy Young winner
description: The Chicago Cubs are reportedly considering a blockbuster trade for Detroit Tigers ace Tarik Skubal, a two-time Cy Young winner, to fill the void left by Kyle Tucker's expected free agency departure. This move would create a formidable pitching duo with rookie Cade Horton and signal a serious World Series push for the Cubs.

title: Auston Matthews’ captaincy questioned as ex-GM says Leafs chose wrong captain
description: Former executive Gord Stellick questions Auston Matthews' captaincy, suggesting leadership and talent are not synonymous. He believes the team lost its compass after the shift, with John Tavares' quiet professionalism now seen as a potential stabilizing force. The current leadership faces a critical test to steer the team back to resilience.

title: Ford CEO warns: We are in deep trouble because the US lacks skilled labour
description: Ford CEO Jim Farley warns of a critical US trade worker shortage, leaving 1 million jobs unfilled. He highlights a dangerous gap compared to China in building essential workforces, impacting national security. Farley advocates for rebuilding the blue-collar pipeline through investment in trade schools and education, emphasizing fair wages and career paths for workers.
